name: beVaiR
description:
beVaiR is a unique combination of story and immersive VR strategy game.




Immerse yourself in a dystopian future, join a faction and help it dominate by collecting, modifying and shooting energy.




Create new nodes and manipulate the neural network surrounding you. Find a way to influence the AI and pry all secretes out of it.




Prevent the network from being sabotaged or take advantage of it.




Choose your favorite playlist and let the network respond to songs from your local music library.




Unveil the puzzle by uncovering the entire story of lies and intrigue.




Be strategic. beVaiR.
